title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Promotion of Foreign Trade (Transfer
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Promotion of Foreign Trade (Transfer 

of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 23 September 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited promotion foreign trade (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2020 (2) order come operation 23 september 2020

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Business, Enterprise and Innovation. 

(2) References to the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade contained in 
any Act or any instrument made thereunder and relating to any administration 
and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Department of Business, Enterprise and 
Innovation.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department business enterprise innovation (2) reference department foreign affair trade contained act instrument made thereunder relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department business enterprise innovation

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade in
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade in 
relation to the Government strategy for the promotion and development of 
overseas trade, tourism and investment consisting of - 

(a) managing and chairing the Export Trade Council (formerly 

known as the Foreign Trade Council), 

(b) 

convening, chairing and managing joint economic commissions, 
and 

(c) 

developing, where appropriate, new joint economic commissions, 

are transferred to the Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation. 

(2) References to the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade contained in 
any Act or instrument made thereunder and relating to any functions transferred 
by this Article shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as 
references to the Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister foreign affair trade relation government strategy promotion development overseas trade tourism investment consisting - (a) managing chairing export trade council (formerly known foreign trade council) (b) convening chairing managing joint economic commission (c) developing appropriate new joint economic commission transferred minister business enterprise innovation (2) reference minister foreign affair trade contained act instrument made thereunder relating function transferred article shall commencement order construed reference minister business enterprise innovation

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade is 
a party and the proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order 
to the Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation, the name of the Minister 
for Business, Enterprise and Innovation shall, in so far as the proceedings relate 
to any function transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for 
that of the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade or added in the proceedings, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [381] 3 

as may be appropriate, and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such 
substitution.

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade may, in so far 
as it relates to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister for Business, 
Enterprise and Innovation, be carried on or completed on or after such 
commencement by the Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister foreign affair trade may far relates function transferred order minister business enterprise innovation carried completed commencement minister business enterprise innovation

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister business enterprise innovation

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade contained in the
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade contained in the 
memorandum and articles of association of any company and relating to any 
function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for Business, Enterprise and 
Innovation.
text_norm: 7 reference minister foreign affair trade contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister business enterprise innovation

title: and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade in 
connection with the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the 
Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation and, accordingly, without any 
further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister 
for Business, Enterprise and Innovation, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Business, 
Enterprise and Innovation, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Business, 
Enterprise and Innovation. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Business, Enterprise and Innovation by 
the 
commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the Minister for 
Foreign Affairs and Trade shall on the request of the Minister for Business, 
Enterprise and Innovation be transferred into the name of the Minister for 
Business, Enterprise and Innovation.
